amendment.description: An amendment numbered 106 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the Department of Labor from administering environmental justice grant programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
